Actions.Name: Blast
Actions.Effects: If a character is poisoned they are also shattered on hit.

Actions.Name: Deluge
Actions.Description: The Hellhound dashes 2, then deals [fray] piercing damage to a foe in range 6.

Actions.Name: Corrosive Gas
Actions.Description: The Hellhound creates a terrain effect space in a free area in range 6. Characters that enter or exit the space, or start their turn there, become vulnerable, burning, and poisoned. The area lasts for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: Spitfire
Actions.Mark: At the end of that character's turn, if that character is still marked, the Hellhound shoots a fiery blast for a blast 1 explosion area effect. Characters within must save. On a successful save, they take [fray] damage. On a failed save they take [D]+[fray] and are poisoned and burning. If the explosion would hit an area of corrosive gas, it detonates the area, destroying it but increases the area to blast 2 and all damage by +[D]. Either way, the mark ends.
